The 12th Asia Pacific Screen Awards were held on 29 November 2018 in Brisbane, Australia.
Winners and nominees
won for Achievement in Directing for Capharnaüm.]]
won Best Actor for Manto.]]
won Best Actress for Ash Is Purest White.]]
